div.bibl: Chicago Greek Daily, Nov. 3, 1931. [DANCE PROVIDES FUNDS FOR SOLON SCHOOL]

body.p: p. 2- The annual dance given last Sunday by the St. James Society for the benefit of Solon school was a complete success.

The success of the dance was due to the efforts of the ladies of the ladies of the North Side and to the church committee, especially to its president, Mr. Ch. Davlanti, an indefatigable worker for the interests of his community.
